Detailed Description

The file implements the mmWave control module which interfaces with the mmWave Link API and communicates with the BSS.

Function Documentation

int32_t MMWave_deviceCfgAsyncEvent ( const MMWave_MCB *  ptrMMWaveMCB,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is used to configure the asynchronous events. On Dual core either the DSS or the MSS could be configured to be the recepient of asynchronous events. It also configures if the start/stop asynchronous events are enabled or disabled.

Parameters
[in]ptrMMWaveMCBPointer to the mmWave control block
[out]errCodeError code populated on error
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
